hero.title: Speaking & Events

upcoming.title: AI in the Cloud Day Bengaluru
upcoming.talk: Building smarter AI systems with Microsoft Autogen
upcoming.description: Presenting on AI agent orchestration using Microsoft AutoGen framework, demonstrating how to build intelligent multi-agent systems with Docker.

past.title: DevTools Day Bengaluru

past.title: Kubetools Day 3.0

past.title: Neo4j Summer Workshop
past.talk: Hands-on Neo4j Setup & Basics + Assignment Briefing
